body.name: Chicco Bravo Quick-Fold Stroller - Black | Black
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Sunday, February 18. Order within 15 hrs 26 mins
FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 7 hrs 56 mins
features: Full-size, easy-to-use stroller features a parent-friendly design to simplify travel from infant through toddler
One-hand, smart fold design is compact and stands upright on its wheels without the push handle touching the ground
Removable seat and canopy transform Bravo to a lightweight car seat carrier for streamlined travel from day one
Offers secure, click-in attachment for all Chicco infant car seats (sold separately) via the child tray – no adapter needed
UPF 50+ canopy with peek-a-boo mesh window, large wheels with treaded tires and a large storage basket with front & rear access and 2 organizer pockets
body.description: A Walk in the Park with BravoMake every outing feel like a walk in the park with the easy-to-use Bravo Quick-Fold Stroller. Three modes – a lightweight infant car seat carrier, a versatile travel system and a full-size toddler stroller – cater to your travel needs as your little one grows from newborn to toddler. A breeze to open and fold, the Bravo Stroller features a one-hand smart fold with auto-swivel wheels so it stands upright without the parent handle touching the ground.For lightweight infant travel, Bravo features a removable canopy and toddler seat, conveniently converting it to a streamlined car seat frame carrier. The versatile stroller accepts all Chicco infant car seats (sold separately) via the child tray with no adapter needed.For child comfort, Bravo features a one-hand, multi-position reclining seat. The large, UPF 50+ canopy with a peek-a-boo mesh window provides privacy and protection from the elements.The Bravo Stroller showcases large, sleek wheels with treaded tires and all-wheel suspension to navigate uneven terrain. Rear-linked foot brakes secure the stroller with a simple tap and the multi-position push handle adjusts in height for parent comfort. The large storage basket features 2 organizer pockets, mesh sides for visibility and easy front & rear access.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Extra Compact Fold Child tray folds tightly to the stroller frame for a compact fold that stands independently and is easy to carry and store. UPF 50+ Canopy Full coverage canopy with pull-out visor and peek-a-boo mesh window. Reversible Cushion Removeable seat cushion provides added comfort with cozy knit or breathable mesh. Treaded Tires Large wheels with treaded tires and all-wheel suspension for smooth strolling. Parent Convenience 3-position adjustable push handle, parent tray with 2 spacious cup holders and covered storage pocket.
GREENGUARD Gold Certified Products have been tested to meet standards for low chemical emissions, contributing to healthier air quality around baby.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to fold, compact, adjusting handle
reviews.reviewText: Stroller was easy to put together and we are enjoying using it. The mechanism to fold it can be done with one hand, however, it is a bit too heavy to lift into the car's trunk with one hand . The design is sleek. We're in between using the carseat and just sitting in the stroller. The harness system is the only negative so far. It does not stay together easily and is a bit of a struggle between holding a wiggly, perhaps not happy baby, and piecing together the five point harness- each time. It may not be a big deal once we do not have to use the five points and can just use the lap harness. Still looks new after months of dirt road walks. Lots of room for water bottles for all involved and the storage basket below is large. I often use it instead of a cart at the grocery store. Overall, I am pleased with the purchase and would buy it again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to fold
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using this stroller since recovering from c section - it has been easy to get in and out of the trunk by myself and it’s great as a travel system with the infant car seat. This is a great stroller at a great price point - not too heavy but still holds up well for longer walks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’m loving it, very convenient and easy to fold to put up in trunk. Easy to assemble!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BEST STROLLER EVER
reviews.reviewText: I’ve tried 5 different strollers before finding this one lol. Some not to buy - The mini version of this - the wheels broke in a month, A cool lightweight one from Amazon that was amazing but didn’t sit up right, and the graco modes which was a wobbly piece of junk.This one is amazing. Cup holders for both mom and baby. Nice handlebar for me. Phone holder. Big sturdy wheels that aren’t going to break and can handle rough terrain. Big underneath compartment for a large diaper bag. The seat goes fully upright and reclines with a nice lever instead of a flimsy string (what the more compact ones have). Smoooooth ride.For the 100-300 price point this is the absolute best stroller on the market. You need it. And my next baby car seat can click right in.The ONLY con would be it’s heavy when it’s folded up who cares it’s my new arm workout!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to handle and easy to fold and put away. Love this stroller

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I was looking for
reviews.reviewText: I like how sleek my stroller looks, its durable, easy to load/unload and its compact to fit perfectly in my car!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Heavy but nice
reviews.reviewText: Haven’t put it together yet, may update later, but so far:PROS: 1) Cleartex material is great, very reduced smell, 2) folds wellCONS: Heavy and not compact, it says easy folding which is technically true but I was expecting something lighter when advertised as such. Would not recommend this for a travel system, its weigh and bulk are something more for use in the local neighborhood or in/out of the trunk. Flying / going through the airport with this would be a nightmare.Torn between keeping it because of the weight, but the material is great and it fits the car seat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this stroller
reviews.reviewText: I really loved this stroller since I got it for my baby, well built, going into a year with it and still holds strong after what I put it through, mostly daily walks, rough terrain and baby feels comfortable in it.
